content.rendered:
HSA Organization

The Greenfield School community is supportive of our educational program. We are blessed with numerous parent volunteers who help in classrooms, fundraise for special programs and supplies and help coordinate school-wide events. We have an active parent organization. Our Home School Association (HSA) is a volunteer group. We encourage you to become a member of our HSA.

Families are an integral part of our students’ success. We look forward to collaborating with our families through frequent communications, volunteer opportunities, and parent conferences.

Board Members

President – Kate Britton
Vice President – Kim Joyce
Treasurer – Nicole Witham
Co-Secretaries – Jill Blackman and Erika Dibble
